claims.subject: Meta
claims.statement: Maintained net zero GHG emissions in global operations since 2020

claims.subject: Meta
claims.statement: Completed 18 operational water restoration projects returning more than 1.5 billion gallons of water to high and medium water stress regions

claims.subject: Meta
claims.statement: Contracted more than 11,700 megawatts of renewable energy

claims.subject: Meta
claims.statement: Committed to becoming water positive by 2030, restoring 200% of water consumed in high water stress areas and 100% in medium water stress areas

claims.subject: Meta
claims.statement: Recycled 90% of construction waste in data centers in 2023

claims.subject: company
claims.statement: Achieved record revenue of $2.4 billion in Q3 2024

claims.subject: company
claims.statement: 15% revenue increase year-over-year

claims.subject: company
claims.statement: Cost reduction initiatives saved $50 million annually

claims.subject: company
claims.statement: Increased market share by 8 percentage points in telecommunications sector

claims.subject: company
claims.statement: Profit margin improved to 23.5%, up from 19.2%

claims.subject: company
claims.statement: Investment in R&D totaled $180 million, representing 7.5% of total revenue

claims.subject: company
claims.statement: Employee productivity increased by 12% following new workflow systems

claims.subject: literacy program
claims.statement: reached 25,000 children across 150 rural schools in 2024

claims.subject: job training initiative
claims.statement: placed 85% of participants in full-time employment within six months of completion

claims.subject: military transition program
claims.statement: hired 300 veterans, exceeding annual target by 25%

claims.subject: community health clinics
claims.statement: served 50,000 patients and reduced infant mortality rates by 30% in target regions

claims.subject: scholarship program
claims.statement: provided $5 million in educational funding to 1,200 first-generation college students

claims.subject: supplier diversity program
claims.statement: sources 40% of materials from minority-owned businesses

claims.subject: Solar Panel Installations
claims.statement: Solar panel installations generated 12 million kWh of clean energy, avoiding 8,500 tons of CO2 emissions

claims.subject: Water Conservation
claims.statement: Water conservation efforts reduced consumption by 2.5 million gallons compared to 2023 baseline levels

claims.subject: Manufacturing Waste Management
claims.statement: The company diverted 95% of manufacturing waste from landfills through improved recycling and composting programs

claims.subject: Fleet Electrification
claims.statement: Fleet electrification replaced 500 diesel vehicles with electric alternatives, reducing emissions by 1,200 tons annually

claims.subject: Reforestation Projects
claims.statement: Reforestation projects planted 75,000 native trees across 2,000 acres of degraded land

claims.subject: Energy Efficiency
claims.statement: Energy efficiency upgrades decreased facility electricity usage by 35% while maintaining production levels

claims.subject: Google Tensor Processing Unit
claims.statement: Google's sixth-generation Tensor Processing Unit (TPU) Trillium is over 67% more energy-efficient than TPU v5e

claims.subject: AI Model Training
claims.statement: Research shows tested practices can reduce energy required to train AI models by up to 100 times and reduce associated emissions by up to 1,000 times when used together

claims.subject: UK Energy Infrastructure
claims.statement: The UK became the first G7 nation to completely phase out coal power in September 2024 with closure of Ratcliffe-on-Soar coal plant after 140 years

claims.subject: Global Hydropower
claims.statement: Global hydropower capacity increased by 400 GW, solidifying its position as the largest renewable electricity source

claims.subject: Microsoft
claims.statement: Microsoft committed to becoming carbon negative, water positive, zero waste, and protect more land than we use by 2030

claims.subject: Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability
claims.statement: Expanded to include Scopes 1, 2, and all 15 categories of Scope 3 carbon emissions tracking

claims.subject: Planetary Computer
claims.statement: Provides open access to petabytes of environmental monitoring data
